text: phraxngkh thrng hı klangkhun kheapi nı klangwan læa thrng hı klangwan kheapi nı klangkhun læa thrng hı sing thi mi chiwit xxk cak sing thi mimi chiwit læa thrng hı sing thi mimi chiwit xxk cak sing thi mi chiwit læa thrng hı paccay yangchiph kæ phu thi pha xngkh thrng prasngkh doy prascak kar khanwn
